content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    wrapped_text = ""

    for word in words
        if length(wrapped_text) + length(word) <= text_width
            wrapped_text *= word * " "
        else
            wrapped_text *= "\n" * word * " "
        end
    end

    return wrapped_text
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
text = "In Julia, Write a function wrap_string."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)
```

This will output the text wrapped at a maximum width of 10 characters.
